name: The Night Is Dark And Full Of Terror
name_original: The Night Is Dark And Full Of Terror
description:
The Night Is Dark And Full Of Terror was developed for #LOWREZJAM 2016

Developed in Unity, rendered in 64x64 glorious grayscale pixels

The first game "completed" by Dead Genre Studios (big quotations on completed). A spooky dungeon crawler with a battle system loosely inspired Legend of Dragoon.

WASD or directional keys move the character. When prompted, use the same keys, as well as the space bar, to vanquish the enemy before the timer runs out. Reach the end of the maze to beat the game, and don't forget to keep an eye on your score at the top-right! Run and hide or stand and fight, your call.

"The dark souls of jam games" -Someone

Programming by @jamjnsn

Art, level design and music by @RhiRhitweeting
